content: Generate a list of 23 words that end with 'ous'.

1. Courageous
2. Mysterious
3. Dangerous
4. Curious
5. Gracious
6. Precious
7. Ambitious
8. Jealous
9. Famous
10. Envious
11. Glorious
12. Spacious
13. Generous
14. Various
15. Obnoxious
16. Rigorous
17. Continuous
18. Ambiguous
19. Victorious
20. Precocious
21. Nervous
22. Serious
23. Joyous

I hope this helps! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask.
